mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.department_code AS "departmentCode", a.department_name AS "departmentName", a.department_category AS "archiveDepartment.id", a.manager_person AS "managerPerson", a.phone_no AS "phoneNo", a.first_unit AS "firstUnit", a.comment AS "comment", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", d.department_code AS "archiveDepartment.departmentCode", d.department_name AS "archiveDepartment.departmentName", a.remark AS "remark"
LEFT JOIN archive_department d ON d.id = a.department_category
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_department a
AND a.department_code LIKE '%'||#{departmentCode}||'%' '%'+#{departmentCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{departmentCode}, '%')
AND a.department_name LIKE '%'||#{departmentName}||'%' '%'+#{departmentName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{departmentName}, '%')
AND a.department_category LIKE '%'||#{departmentCategory}||'%' '%'+#{departmentCategory}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{departmentCategory}, '%')
AND a.manager_person LIKE '%'||#{managerPerson}||'%' '%'+#{managerPerson}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{managerPerson}, '%')
AND a.phone_no LIKE '%'||#{phoneNo}||'%' '%'+#{phoneNo}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{phoneNo}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_department( department_code, department_name, department_category, manager_person, phone_no, first_unit, comment, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{departmentCode}, #{departmentName}, #{archiveDepartment.id}, #{managerPerson}, #{phoneNo}, #{firstUnit}, #{comment}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_department SET department_code = #{departmentCode}, department_name = #{departmentName}, department_category = #{archiveDepartment.id}, manager_person = #{managerPerson}, phone_no = #{phoneNo}, first_unit = #{firstUnit}, comment = #{comment}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
